paper_abstract: Purpose - The paper seeks to solve nonlinear magnetostatic field problems with the integral equation method and different indirect formulations. Design/methodology/approach - To avoid large cancellation errors in cases where the demagnetizing field is high a difference field concept is used. This requires the computation of sources of the scalar potential of the excitation field. Findings - A new formulation to compute these sources is presented. The improved computational accuracy is demonstrated with numerical examples. Originality/value - The paper develops a novel formulation for the computation of sources of scalar excitation potential.
paper_title: Accuracy improvement in nonlinear magnetostatic field computations with integral equation methods and indirect total scalar potential formulations
